name: Gravity (ClimbingPenguin)
description:
This is Gravity, a small puzzle game with little controls in mind. The only button you use to play is Z, and you control the whole world with it. I have used Gamemaker Studio 2 for this project.

The music is from Jamie Nord, whose youtube channel is HERE.

the specific song is:

song

In the future I would like to add more mechanics (because I didn't have much time), inprove the sounds and inprove on the graphics.
